{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant information can be found in Document [2]. According to the document, the thermic effect of food depends on the composition of the food consumed. Carbohydrates have a thermic effect of 5 to 15% of the energy consumed, fats have a thermic effect of at most 5 to 15%, and proteins have a thermic effect of 20 to 30%. Therefore, the maximum thermic effect of food is seen with protein.", "answer_choice": "B. Protein"}
